treasury_media.title: Meditation VR on Steam
treasury_media.description: Meditation VR is a series of high-fidelity meditation experiences. Our aim was to raise the bar of meditative experiences in VR to truly transport you to a beautiful dream location.

treasury_media.title: My Carer - Alzheimer’s Society
treasury_media.description:
My Carer is a voice application built to support people in the early stages of dementia. With My Carer they can set up daily reminders for the person living with dementia, enabling them to live more independently.

2 Cannes Lions Shortlists: New Realities & Voice Activation and Data Driven Consumer Product
2 Clio Awards: User Experience and Other
3 London International Awards (LIA) awards: Innovative Use of Digital, Best New Creative Technology, UX - User Experience
+ More awards

awards.title: Best Immersive Game Honourable Mention
awards.description:
For the seventh year in a row, Raindance is celebrating all independent XR creators, game developers, virtual world builders and performers with the festival’s Raindance Immersive Awards. The awards celebrate the creativity, ingenuity, and artistry expressed in immersive storytelling, game design and virtual world building over the last year.

https://www.raindanceimmersive.com/awards

Kayak VR: Mirage is a jaw-dropping and exhilarating journey through beautiful locations, made for Virtual Reality. Maneuver our fully physically accurate kayak around checkpoints and crown yourself the fastest, or take it easy and use the free roam mode and enjoy the scenery.

https://kayakvr.com

ADC has been championing the very best in commercial creativity ever since the club’s inception. This lead to the creation of the ADC Annual Awards in 1921, and for nearly a century it has been an uninterrupted celebration of the artistry and craftsmanship that is synonymous with beautiful advertising and design.

https://www.adc.de

awards.description:
Bronze - Creative Technology and Public Interest

The Epica Awards are an annual series of communication awards, created in 1987 and based in Paris, France. Having originally focused on the Europe, Middle East and Africa region exclusively, the awards became global in 2012. 585 agencies in total submitted to work to the Epica Awards in 2015, representing 75 countries.

https://winners.epica-awards.com/2019/winner/21-03111-DIG/mccann-europe/my-carer

The London International Awards, or LIA are a worldwide awards annually honouring excellence in advertising, digital media, production, design, music & sound and branded entertainment. It was the first international advertising award of its kind to acknowledge all media and methods from around the world to be judged by a diverse global jury.

profile_positions.description:
Ayuto helpt patiënten en zorgverleners met oplossingen vanuit een voice-first strategie. Om langer veilig en zelfstandig thuis te kunnen wonen, om gericht te werken aan een gezonde leefstijl of om beter te kunnen omgaan met eenzaamheid. Voice-first helpt zorgverleners bovendien om efficiënter te werken in betere omstandigheden.

www.ayuto.io
profile_positions.title: Founder

profile_positions.company: Skilled.app - Are you thinking about voice yet?
profile_positions.description:
Skilled helps you launch a fully functional Amazon Alexa voice skill through a simple and intuitive interface.

Skilled can help all types of content creators talk to their people. Whether you're an influencer,
content creator, publisher, brand or agency, our Voice Experts are here to help.

After choosing a template that matches with your business type, you can create an Alexa Skill in just a few simple steps.

You can test your skill and connect to your Amazon account (Skilled helps you set this up) to publish through Skilled. Once approved by Amazon - your skill is live to download and use on over 80 million Alexa devices worldwide!

www.skilled.app

profile_positions.description: At Blendle I focussed on the hidden structures in huge collections of unstructured documents which are too large to be processed by hand.
